Fighters.Name: Dr. Jill Trent
Fighters.Text:
GADGETOLOGY
At the start of your turn, activate one of your gadgets.
Whenever Jill Trent attacks, resolve the active gadget's effect.

Hypnoray Blaster
DURING COMBAT: If your card's printed value is lower than your opponent's, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. Increase the value of your attack by the BOOST value of the revealed card.

Ultrabiotic Tonic
AFTER COMBAT: If your card's printed value is higher than your opponent's, Jill Trent Recovers 1 health.

Fighters.Name: Daisy
Fighters.Text:
GADGETOLOGY
At the start of your turn, activate one of your gadgets.
Whenever Jill Trent attacks, resolve the active gadget's effect.

Hypnoray Blaster
DURING COMBAT: If your card's printed value is lower than your opponent's, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. Increase the value of your attack by the BOOST value of the revealed card.

Ultrabiotic Tonic
AFTER COMBAT: If your card's printed value is higher than your opponent's, Jill Trent Recovers 1 health.

Card.Name: Hypnotist
Card.Text: Immediately: If your active gadget is Hypnoray Blaster, cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Battle of Wits
Card.Text: After combat: Reveal the top card of your deck and your opponent's deck. If your card has a higher BOOST value, deal 3 damage to the opposing fighter.

Card.Name: Utility Belt
Card.Text: After combat: Choose one: -Jill Trent recovers 1 health, -Move Jill Trent 1 space, -Draw 1 card

Card.Name: Stasis Diffuser
Card.Text: Immediately: The value of your opponent's card is equal to its printed value and cannot be changed.

Card.Name: Gyroscopic Jetpack
Card.Text: After combat: Move your fighter up to 2 spaces. They may move through opposing fighters.

Card.Name: Indestructible Cloth
Card.Text: Immediately: This combat, your fighter does not take damage from effects other than combat damage.

Card.Name: Laser Pen
Card.Text: After combat: Deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

Card.Name: Insightful Deduction
Card.Text: After combat: Reveal the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. Put one of them on the bottom of the deck and the rest on top in any order.

Card.Name: Caught Red-Handed
Card.Text: After combat: Your opponent discards 1 card. If you won the combat, they discard 2 cards instead.

Card.Name: Helpful Assistant
Card.Text: Shuffle up to 3 Jill Trent cards in your discard pile back into your deck. Draw 1 card.

Card.Name: Sisters in Arms
Card.Text: This card's effects cannot be canceled. If Daisy and Jill Trent are adjacent and Daisy is attacking, Daisy gains the effect of Jill Trent's gadget.
